text: Motion
Motion
Hey hey, Producer,

So, how serious is the award Asahi-chan
is going to receive this time?

Considered one of the top awards for new idols
or so I've heard.

Wow, I've always thought it's no joke, but
it's really amazing, huh, Asahi-chan.
Yeah, that's right...

.......
But, even for Mei and Fuyuko--

--But, you know,
it's a bit off, isn't it?

?
Off?

I mean, having just Asahi-chan
sprint ahead like that, isn't it bad?

Asahi-chan, Fuyuko-chan, they're
rivals, but also part of Straylight, right?

For me,
they're even more precious friends than that.

It feels kind of distant
to see it turning out like that.
It's just sad, you know, that kind of thing
...... Yeah, I feel the same way.
(So... for Mei and Fuyuko...)
That's why, I've got to give it my all!

With the two of them,
to stay friends forever!
